title: i signed up for pbe long time a go
body:
hello there 
i signed up for pbe for a hope i would try the reworked urgot plz 
i even singed up for na server i play on euw and signed up there 
plz i wanna try him i think he can carry me  out of silver

replies.body: For the time being PBE signups are still closed. I don't yet have the info on when signups will be open again, but be sure to check out our [**news page**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news) to stay updated!

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=Qaec9rue,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-07-08T02:30:36.952+0000)
>
> For the time being PBE signups are still closed. I don't yet have the info on when signups will be open again, but be sure to check out our [**news page**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news) to stay updated!

yeah but i signed up like two months ago  will i be in the urgot rework cycle
